original_text: Hagar was a slave. Her son was born as a result of what Abraham himself decided. But Abraham's wife, Sarah, gave birth to the other son. That son was born as a result of what God had promised to Abraham.
korean_text: 여종에게서는 육체를 따라 났고 자유 있는 여자에게서는 약속으로 말미암았느니라

sentences.original_text: as a result of what Abraham himself decided.
But Abraham's wife, Sarah, gave birth to the other son.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아브라함의 아내 사라가 다른 아들을 낳았습니다.

sentences.original_text: as a result of what God had promised to Abraham.
